content: complimentary pattern winnipeg hat design by bobbi intveld pattern no for use with 202335 woolstok north super bulky for use with woolstok north super bulky winnipeg hat design by bobbi intveld description this unisex hat is ideal for cold and windy days knit with one hank of woolstok north choose simple and stylish or add some fun with earflaps and a big pom experience level gauge in stockinette stitch 10 sts and 14 row = 4 advanced beginner sizes finished measurements 20 one circumference 8 not including earflaps height materials yarn needles 9mm 16 circular needle or size needed to woolstok north super bulky size 13 obtain gauge 100% fine highland wool 150g/107yds 1 hank 9mm double pointed needles or size needed size 13 to obtain gauge color shown color shown no 4303 no 4314 highland fleece with earflaps deep velvet without earflaps other tools stitch marker tapestry needle p 02 blue sky fibers notes change to double pointed needles when stitches no longer fit comfortably on circular needle ear flap hat with pom uses 138 grams and basic hat uses 80 grams step no 1 hat co 50 sts join to work in the round being careful not earflaps optional to twist sts pm to mark start of round flip hat upside down starting at the beg of round with rs *k1 p1 repeat from * to end facing count over 3 sts pick up through back loop only rnds 1-4 and k 14 sts k to end round 5 p1 k1 p to last 2 sts k1 row 1 and all ws row ws repeat last round until piece measures 6 from co p1 crown shaping k1 p1 k to last 2 sts p1 k1 row 2 rs round 1 *k8 k2tog repeat from * to end 45 sts row 4 k1 p1 k to last 2 sts p1 k1 round 2 *k7 k2tog repeat from * to end 40 sts row 6 k1 p1 ssk k to last 4 sts k2tog p1 k1 12 sts round 3 *k6 k2tog repeat from * to end 35 sts row 8 k1 p1 ssk k to last 4 sts k2tog p1 k1 10 sts round 4 *k5 k2tog repeat from * to end 30 sts row 10 k1 p1 ssk k to last 4 sts k2tog p1 k1 8 sts round 5 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end 25 sts bobble loosely round 6 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to end 20 sts count over 16 sts from first earflap repeat pick up for second earflap *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end 15 sts round 7 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end 10 sts round 8 *k2tog repeat from * to end 5 sts round 9 cut yarn leaving 8 tail thread through rem sts and pull to close p 03 blue sky fibers step no 2 finishing weave in ends block as desired optional make pom and attach step no 3 care hand wash or dry
